parameter.name: Interface
parameter.description: This value will be configured in the {{param|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}.Interface}} parameter of the instances that will be created during this test campaign.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: This value will be configured in the {{param|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}.HostName}} parameter of the instances that will be created during this test campaign.

parameter.name: DNSServer
parameter.description: This value will be configured in the {{param|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}.DNSServer}} parameter of the instances that will be created during this test campaign.

parameter.name: DNSServer2
parameter.description: If not empty, another {{object|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}}} instance is created for each iteration, to perform the lookup test on this secondary name server.

parameter.name: Timeout
parameter.description: This value will be configured in the {{param|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}.Timeout}} parameter of the instances that will be created during this test campaign.

parameter.name: NumberOfRepetitions
parameter.description: This value will be configured in the {{param|.DNS.Diagnostics.X_ADB_NSLookup.{i}.NumberOfRepetitions}} parameter of the instances that will be created during this test campaign.
